metadata.title: CVE-2017-14608 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
In LibRaw through 0.18.4, an out of bounds read flaw related to kodak_65000_load_raw has been reported in dcraw/dcraw.c and internal/dcraw_common.cpp. An attacker could possibly exploit this flaw to disclose potentially sensitive memory or cause an application crash.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-14608` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libraw-bin - 0.18.5-1
libraw20 - 0.18.5-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: darktable package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
dcraw package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
exactimage package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
kodi package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
libraw package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.18.5-1').
rawtherapee package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
